*Learning_For_User_Guide.

= Learning =

* Learning Overview *
Learning Overview
    LEARNING is the feature of DYSCOVER which is developed to learn the alphabets  and numbers. This applet will help  to  all those kids around the world  with learning disabilities to know the proper pronunciation of the words.
    
   It is specially for tiny nursery tots and will help them in learning the alphabets and numbers in the fun way.  With  this, children  will recognize the alphabets and numbers along with its picture and also will find proper pronunciation of  the respective  word. Also the child can fill the correct alphabets and numbers.
   
   This is a place where not only children but also anyone can learn to make their letters and numbers. Then start learning from alphabets and numbers.


*_WORKING OF THE MODULE_*

 
   =Select the Page for learning=

  _To start learning:_
  
  1. Click any of the option button such as Introduction to alphabet or Fill in the blanks for alphabet or Introduction to Number or Fill in the blanks for Numbers.
  
  2. After selecting hit the start button.
   
  3. The Selected option will open the page.
 
  4. If wants to exit the Learning then Click Exit.




  =Introduction to Alphabet=
  
   _To start Introduction to alphabet:_
  
   1.  Click the alphabet button from A-Z.
  
   2.  After selecting the button for A-Z alphabet the corresponding alphabet and image with its word will display.
  
   3.  The selected button will speech the pronunciation for that word.
  
   4.  Then wants to go on the other page, and then get back to the Learning front page by selecting Back Button. Select other option for next page.
 
   5.  If wants to exit the Introduction to Alphabet then Click Exit.


 

   =Introduction to Number=
  
  _To start Introduction to Number:_
  
   1.  Click the Number button from 1-10.
 
   2.   After selecting the button for 1-10 numbers the corresponding number and image with its word will display.
  
   3.   The selected button will speech the pronunciation for that word.
  
   4.   The 11-100 numbers will display by selecting Next button. The image and word will not display.
  
   5.   If wants to go on the Introduction to Alphabet the select ABC Button which will send to alphabet page.
  
   6.   Back Button will return you on the first Learning page. Select other option for next page. And Exit Button will close the application page.



 

  =Fill in the blanks for Alphabet=
  
  _To start the fill in the blanks:_
  
   1.	Fill the blank Textbox with the appropriate alphabet from A-Z  alphabet.
  
   2.	Then check whether the alphabet is correct or not by using Check Button.
  
   3.	Click the Next Button for Small alphabet (a-z) and then fill it.
  
   4.	Back Button will return you on the first Learning page. Select other option for next page. And Exit Button will close the application page.
   
   Note:-
	First fill all the alphabet in the textbox then check all the alphabet. It will only check only after filling all the alphabets.


  

   =Fill in the blanks for Number=
  
  _To start the fill in the blanks:_
  
   1.	Fill the blank Textbox with the appropriate Number from 1-30 Numbers.

   2.	Then check whether the Number is correct or not by using Check Button.

   3.	Back Button will return you on the first Learning page. Select other option for next page. And Exit Button will close the application page.
  
   Note:-
	First fill all the Number in the textbox then check all the Number. It will only check only after filling all the number
